publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3768 Maureen Watt: UK Government Cuts—That the Parliament calls on all local authorities to back the Scottish Government’s fight to put a halt to HM Government’s proposals to slash £500 million from the Scottish Budget in each of the next two financial years as, if implemented, this £1 billion cut would have a hugely detrimental effect on the provision of public services to the people of Scotland. Supported by: Brian Adam*, Stuart McMillan*, Ian McKee*, Stewart Maxwell*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Bill Kidd*, Bill Wilson*
S3M-3768 UK Government Cuts (lodged on 23 March 2009) Jamie Hepburn*, Bob Doris*, Kenneth Gibson*, Gil Paterson*, Anne McLaughlin*, Willie Coffey*, Sandra White*
S3M-3768 UK Government Cuts (lodged on 23 March 2009) Dave Thompson*

S3M-3768 Maureen Watt: UK Government Cuts—That the Parliament calls on all local authorities to back the Scottish Government’s fight to put a halt to HM Government’s proposals to slash £500 million from the Scottish Budget in each of the next two financial years as, if implemented, this £1 billion cut would have a hugely detrimental effect on the provision of public services to the people of Scotland. Supported by: Brian Adam, Stuart McMillan, Ian McKee, Stewart Maxwell, Joe FitzPatrick, Bill Kidd, Bill Wilson, Jamie Hepburn, Bob Doris, Kenneth Gibson, Gil Paterson, Anne McLaughlin, Willie Coffey, Sandra White, Dave Thompson, Michael Matheson*
S3M-3768 UK Government Cuts (lodged on 23 March 2009) Christina McKelvie*
